block_comment: This block of Verilog RTL code configures address multiplexing and data routing. If the S2_AXI_ENABLE parameter is not set, direct assignments between ports are performed. If it is set, then address lines of AXI ports are first masked and the "axi_mcb_synch" and "axi_mcb" modules are instantiated. The "axi_mcb_synch" module synchronizes the calibration done signal, and the "axi_mcb" module performs the multiplexing and routing work based on the instantiated AXI configuration parameters and ports.
